PARAM: text:Please leave your message after the tone.  When finished, press the pound key for more options.
text: To save your message, press 1.  To listen to your message, press 2.  To erase and re-record, press 3.  To cancel, press 4.
text:Please hold while I delete your message|var:util.deleteVoiceRecording(session['language'])
text: Your message has been saved.  Good bye.
text:Please hold while I retrieve your message|var:util.getVoiceRecording()
text:Your message has been cancelled.  Good bye.
